1.title: Episode #1.1
1.plot: Zayn wonders how long Samira will hide their relationship from her family. Aunty Zoya sows seeds of doubt in Sana's mind about Yasir, while she emotionally blackmails Zohaib to marry Samira. Shelly can't wait for Zayn's wedding as she practices dancing to a Bollywood song. Bilal calls Samira to tell her about his future plans.

2.title: Episode #1.2
2.plot: Samira tries to be discreet but Zoya Aunty is two steps ahead. Yasir makes an important decision about Samira's future while Maheen makes another attempt to break-up the happy couple. Ahmed wants to know who Samira's father is. And Margarita has an unexpected visitor.

3.title: Episode #1.3
3.plot: Yasir agrees to meet Zayn, but is disappointed with Samira's decision. Zoya is shocked while Zohaib works on a plan to stop Samira and Zayn's wedding. Maheen hopes things will change. Bilal surprises Yasmin with a gift. And Susan invites Margarita over.

4.title: Episode #1.4
4.plot: Zayn is upset with Yasir as Samira tries to convince him to apologize. Zoya and Zohaib plan their next move while Susan talks with Margarita about the Shah family. Yasmin is worried about Bilal not calling her.

5.title: Episode #1.5
5.plot: Zayn continues getting more prank calls which has Samira worried. Zoya and Zohaib start settling in their new home. Sana confronts Zoya while Margarita gives her a cold shoulder. Yasmin decides she needs a plan B in case things don't work out with Bilal.

6.title: Episode #1.6
6.plot: As Zayn recovers from his injuries Samira and Yasmin keep him company. Zoya and Zohaib win on one front but lose on the other. Sana decides to share the good news with Yasir while Larry gets caught.

7.title: Episode #1.7
7.plot: Both families meet to set a date for Samira and Zayn's wedding. Zoya and Zohaib hatch another plan to prevent this from happening. Larry is finally able to give Margarita some flowers, but Susan catches them red-handed.

8.title: Episode #1.8
8.plot: After failing to frame Shelly, Zoya faces another obstacle. Bilal finally arrives but Yasmin is disappointed. Zohaib tries to get close to Samira while Zayn deals with a family crisis.

9.title: Episode #1.9
9.plot: Zayn, Shelly and Ahmed are devastated after getting the sad news. Yasmin and Bilal's first date doesn't go as planned. Zohaib comes up with a new plan to create a rift between Samira and Zayn. Susan has a new reason to be concerned but Larry doesn't agree.

10.title: Episode #1.10
10.plot: Zayn makes a tough decision after reading Matt's letter. Zoya and Rukhsana catch up while Margarita eavesdrop on their conversation. Yasmin gives Bilal another chance. Susan tells the FBI everything she knows about the Shah Residence.

11.title: Episode #1.11
11.plot: While Zayn's family is unhappy about his break-up with Samira, Yasir sees this as an opportunity to restore his family's reputation. Bilal is forced to make a tough decision. Zoya is determined to find out what Yasir's next move will be with some help from her friend Rukhsana.

12.title: Episode #1.12
12.plot: Bilal and Samira are put in a precarious situation by Yasir while Zayn decides to move on with his life. Disappointed with Zohaib's efforts to lure Samira, Zoya and Rukhsana decide to play a different game. Larry continues his rendezvous with Margarita as Susan watches helplessly.

13.title: Episode #1.13
13.plot: Samira and Bilal try to come to terms with their new relationship as the family prepares for the engagement party. While Larry is excited to attend Susan is not so sure. The evening doesn't go as planned with surprises in store for everyone.

14.title: Episode #1.14
14.plot: Everyone is surprised at Samira's decision to marry Zohaib. Yasir plans his next move while Sana thwarts Zoya's attempt to take over the house. After rekindling their relationship Zayn and Maheen decide to take it to the next level.

15.title: Episode #1.15
15.plot: A new revelation forces Yasir to re-think his stance about Zayn and Samira. Bilal secretly works on a plan to protect the family. Zoya and Zohaib are taken aback by Vera's sudden move. Zayn and Maheen prepare for their wedding day. More surprises are in store for everyone.

imdb.plot outline: Aarzu-e-Mann is a love story set in scenic San Francisco, about a Pakistani-American girl, Samira, who is born in a wealthy and politically connected Shah family. Her falling in love with an American man with a Pakistani American background, makes things complicated, as she struggles to have her conservative and influential father embrace her choice. Being the only child of a wealthy man, other family members are also against her decision and hatch plans to ensure Samira marries within the family. Writer Zulfiqar Talpur weaves an intricate web of stories about expatriates living in the U.S., who hold on to tradition while trying to assimilate in their new homeland.
imdb.title: Aarzu e Mann
plot: Aarzu-e-Mann is a love story set in scenic San Francisco, about a Pakistani-American girl, Samira, who is born in a wealthy and politically connected Shah family. Her falling in love with an American man with a Pakistani American background, makes things complicated, as she struggles to have her conservative and influential father embrace her choice. Being the only child of a wealthy man, other family members are also against her decision and hatch plans to ensure Samira marries within the family. Writer Zulfiqar Talpur weaves an intricate web of stories about expatriates living in the U.S., who hold on to tradition while trying to assimilate in their new homeland.::Amir Jaffer
